turn.2: View on the Amstel from Amsteldijk  View on the Amstel from Amsteldijk (c. 1680) is an oil on canvas painting by the Dutch landscape painter Jacob van Ruisdael.
turn.3: Where is the painting currently on display?
turn.4: It is an example of Dutch Golden Age painting and is now in the collection of the Amsterdam Museum.
turn.5: Was there a recent history of the painting?
turn.6: This painting was purchased in 2007 with support from the Vereniging Rembrandt as an important artifact of Amsterdam history.
